Reviews.Title: “Great location and decent breakfast, free WiFi Internet in room”
Reviews.Author: Mark_Derail
Reviews.Content: sorrento valley close major highway easy drive lajolla airport zoo downtown costly staying downtown quiet neighborhood helpful staff spend 10 extra night hotel instead motel pool wouldnt im nearly six feet tall fit shower head spare appreciate bathrooms adults

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel but you need to be a gymnist to reach the toilet paper.”
Reviews.Author: miami33029
Reviews.Content: love hotel clean comfortable breakfast unbeatable employees probably nicest people hotel stayed ill coming comment ive seen holiday inns toilet paper dont builds hotels sat toilet hate contortionist able reach toilet paper worse stupid cosmetic metal shield hangs roll supposed look nice rips single sheet toilet paper time toilet paper thin time am wrist neck hurt trying reach tear sheet time seriously am surprised guests havent tried rip tried roll didnt whats funny people breakfast agreed dont mention maybe intercontinental hotels read change design forward

Reviews.Title: “Excellent new hotel, but far from everything, need a car”

Reviews.Content: try stay holiday inn express am vacation excellent consistent service quality hotel disappoint clean staff friendly breakfast delicious family enjoyed reason 5 hotel location drive nearby except chilis restaurant price attractive compared hotels located nearer san diego attractions la jolla seaworld downtown san diego recommend hotel car prepared drive little

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”

Reviews.Content: pleasant stay holiday inn express sorrento valley negative 14 miles downtown san diego definitely car stay driving distance sights perfectly reasonable especially la jolla torrey pines bathroom clean lots storage space business park quiet unfortunately pool renovated closed wouldnt anyway breakfast typical continental breakfast cereal milk juices bagels buscuits eggs husband didnt eggs perfectly fine nice value stay
